subject: Amendment to NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ PPP (DBFOT) No. 8.3.36/2020 dated 10.07.2020 -reg.
text: HRdil4 <c7y TTHRf qerdzu (7395 9Rae7 & T@T +AR4, HRT TrTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) {N * 0il-5 & 6, Faer-10, ERa5, # forlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Public Private Partnership/2o23 Policy Circular No.8.3.45/2023 dated November , 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Manthan/ 'interpretations/Clause/2023-24 (Comp: No. 213951)} Sub: Amendment to NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ PPP (DBFOT) No. 8.3.36/2020 dated 10.07.2020 -reg: NHAI's Policy Circular No. NHAI/Policy Guidelines/PPP (DBFOT) No_ 8.3.36/2020 dated 10.07.2020 is amended to add the following in the last sentence of Para-4: save and except for Para-7.8 of this Policy Circular for the purpose of maintenance charges for COS works, which shall be applicable for all types of contracts which are not yet closed/ terminated/ foreclosed" _ 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. {v2 9 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi: 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3.
